JUDGES: David Thór Björgvinsson;Giovanni Bonello;Ján Šikuta;Ledi Bianku;Nebojša Vučinić;Nicolas Bratza;Päivi Hirvelä
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in Viničné .

CARDINAL . On DATE she lodged an action against a limited liability company with ORG . She requested that the decisions , which had been adopted at the general meeting of the company members held on DATE , be declared void .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found a violation of the applicant 's right under LAW to a hearing within a reasonable time , awarded her the equivalent of CARDINAL ( ORG ) ( at that time ) in respect of non - pecuniary damage , ordered ORG to proceed without further delay and to reimburse the applicant 's costs .
CARDINAL . On DATE the civil proceedings were discontinued on the ground that the defendant company had been dissolved and wound up . In the absence of an appeal , the decision became final on DATE .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG rejected a fresh complaint lodged on DATE as being manifestly ill - founded ( as to the length of proceedings ) and for non - exhaustion of domestic remedies ( as to the alleged unfairness of the proceedings and interference with the applicant 's property rights ) . The decision was served on the applicant 's lawyer on DATE .
